author: Molly Byrne
title: 21 Savage says American Dream film was a “parody” and will not be produced - Dexerto
text:
Entertainment Music 21 Savage says American Dream film was a “parody” and will not be produced Molly Byrne ❘ Published: 2024-01-25T22:03:33 ❘ Updated: 2024-01-25T22:03:33 Instagram: 21savage 21 Savage sat down with Shannon Sharpe and revealed that his American Dream film was only a “parody” and will not be released at this time.
21 Savage was interviewed by Shannon Sharpe and revealed that his American Dream film was just an idea and will not come to fruition production-wise.
Sharpe shared his thoughts on why 21 Savage should move forward with making American Dream into a film, as it would accurately represent his life as a migrant turned successful rapper.
Article continues after ad Though 21 Savage doesn’t have plans to make the biopic, saying that it was only a “parody,” he just may take the advice into consideration.
Article continues after ad Shannon Sharpe thinks 21 Savage is the perfect representation of the ‘American Dream’ When 21 Savage sat down to talk with Sharpe , he was asked, “Do you think your story is good enough to be a movie or documentary?”
Before he could answer, Sharpe explained why 21 Savage’s story would be worth a try in the film industry, “You hear about this all the time — people migrating to America, and you’re an American success story.”
Sign up to Dexerto for free and receive: Fewer Ads | Dark Mode | Deals in Gaming, TV and Movies, and Tech Email Sign up Article continues after ad Sharpe was referring to 21 Savage who moved from the UK to the US in 1999 when he was only seven years old.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Complex Music (@complexmusic)
Going on to be one of rap’s top artists, having just debuted at number one on the Billboard 200 with 14 songs from his American Dream album in Billboard Hot 100, it’s no wonder why Sharpe pressed the importance of getting his story out there.
Article continues after ad Though his American Dream film, which featured 21 Savage throughout his life as depicted by Childish Gambino and Caleb McLaughlin, was only a “parody,” 21 Savage is keeping the door open to producing it in the future, saying to Sharpe, “I feel like it could be [a real film] one day.”
Article continues after ad As for what’s next, anything is possible when it comes to 21 Savage , since his creative genius continues to cross borders between music and film.
Related Topics Viral About The Author Molly Byrne In recent years, Molly has interviewed musicians from all over the world, to then migrate into writing for the movie and hiphop industry. Molly began her Viral News and Reality TV coverage for Dexerto in 2023 where she exhibits her passion across a broad range of entertainment topics. To contact Molly, you may email her here: molly.byrne@dexerto.com.

author: Kenneth John
title: Stormy Conditions, Mountain Snow To Hit California; Slow Travel Likely on Weekend | Nature World News
text: Slower commutes and travel concerns are likely in portions of California due to the stormy outlook and mountain snow in the region. The late-week storm can impact the much-awaited travel. California has experienced prolonged drought and raging wildfires due to the dry vegetation and strong winds. The [stormy conditions](https://www.natureworldnews.com/articles/60062/20231228/nws-weather-forecast-heavy-rain-hit-new-england-mid-atlantic.htm) will help provide relief in California and the Western US. In the Pacific Northwest, recent reports showed the rounds of rain that caused more travel concerns due to the freezing outlook and snow. Flooding concerns were also reported due to heavy rain and snowmelt. The [National Weather Service ](https://www.wpc.ncep.noaa.gov/discussions/hpcdiscussions.php?disc=pmdspd)(NWS) reported that an anomalous weather pattern is also expected this weekend. Residents can notice milder temperatures in the northern and western portions of the US. From the Northern Plains to the Northeast, people can expect a warmer weather outlook, with overnight temperatures reaching more than 20 degrees above normal. Stormy Conditions, Mountain Snow in California According to the [recent forecasts](https://www.accuweather.com/en/weather-news/late-week-storm-to-end-californias-dry-stretch-bring-travel-disrupting-rain-snow/1607218), rounds of rain can unfold in parts of San Francisco and Los Angeles as cold air begins this winter. In the late week, the rain is also expected in the following areas: - San Diego - Los Angeles - Fresno - San Francisco - Reno - Redding - California's Central Coast - Sacramento Valley In the higher elevations or Sierra Nevada, people can expect potential snow and precipitation on the weekend. Meanwhile, a dry weather outlook will be likely in Denver and El Paso. Chilly outlook will also unleash in Minneapolis, Chicago and Kansas City. In [Kansas City](https://twitter.com/NWSKansasCity/status/1740126547674296522), light snow is also likely in the region, including in portions of Central Missouri. Residents should anticipate intermittent snow. Potential slightly warmer temperatures can reach in the upper 30s to lower 40s. The snow in California or Sierra Nevada will become helpful in drought conditions or summer in the region when water levels can become very low due to drought. Also Read: [NWS Weather Forecast: Heavy Rain to Hit New England, Mid-Atlantic This Week](https://www.natureworldnews.com/articles/60062/20231228/nws-weather-forecast-heavy-rain-hit-new-england-mid-atlantic.htm) Weather Forecast in Other Parts of the US: Wintry Weather Outlook In the [latest forecast](https://www.natureworldnews.com/articles/60061/20231228/south-weather-forecast-wintry-first-snowflakes-before-2023-ends.htm), chilly weather outlook will be likely in the Plains and [Wyoming](https://www.weather.gov/wwamap/wwatxtget.php?cwa=gjt&wwa=all). The cooler conditions will ease the dry and hotter weather in the US. A freezing rain outlook can impact portions of the South this weekend. Americans should be extra careful in driving due to slower commutes and slippery roads. Moreover, motorists should prepare their vehicles before traveling this week this upcoming holiday. Emergency kits inside vehicles are recommended to avoid road hassles. If the weather doesn't improve, staying at home is advisable, or wait until the weather conditions become better. Related Article: [South US Weather Forecast: Wintry Weather, First Snowflakes Likely Before 2023 Ends](https://www.natureworldnews.com/articles/60061/20231228/south-weather-forecast-wintry-first-snowflakes-before-2023-ends.htm) For more similar stories, don't forget to follow [Nature World News](https://www.natureworldnews.com/) © 2023 NatureWorldNews.com All rights reserved. Do not reproduce without permission.

author: @andaluciainf
title: Duval (Sumar) ve "vergonzoso" el nombramiento de la directora del Instituto de las Mujeres | Andalucía Información. Todas las noticias de Huelva
text: La portavoz de Sumar en materia de feminismo, igualdad y derechos y libertades LGTBI, Elizabeth Duval, ha tildado de "vergonzoso" el nombramiento de Isabel García al frente del Instituto de las Mujeres. "Este nombramiento del Ministerio de Igualdad es vergonzoso y envía un mensaje lamentable. El Instituto de las Mujeres no puede estar dirigido por alguien que sostiene la conspiración del borrado de las mujeres y critica la dictadura queer", ha indicado en redes sociales Duval, que forma parte de la dirección provisional de Sumar hasta la celebración de su asamblea. La Federación Plataforma Trans y Euforia Familias Trans-Aliadas han pedido este jueves a la ministra de Igualdad, Ana Redondo, que "revoque" la designación de la nueva directora del Instituto de las Mujeres y que, en su lugar, "ponga al frente a una mujer que defienda a todas las mujeres, también las trans". En este sentido, los colectivos han denunciado que García "ha mantenido discursos abiertamente transfóbicos y antiderechos trans, durante la tramitación de la Ley Trans" y han indicado que "los recortes de derechos trans llevados a cabo por Ayuso, con la derogación de aspectos fundamentales de las leyes trans y LGTBI de la Comunidad de Madrid y los argumentos esgrimidos para ello, están en los mismos marcos ideológicos que defiende Isabel García". También la portavoz de Más Madrid en la Asamblea de Madrid, Manuela Bergerot, ha cuestionado la designación de la nueva directora del Instituto de las Mujeres, una "mala decisión" que les preocupa. "El Ministerio de Igualdad debe seguir profundizando en los derechos LGTBI y Trans. Más si cabe ahora, cuando gobiernos como el de Madrid los están recortando", ha trasladado la sucesora de Mónica García a través de la red social 'X', antes conocida como Twitter. La senadora de Más Madrid y activista trans, Carla Antonelli, ha reprochado también la elección de Isabel García, que ha "vejado" al colectivo, al frente de este departamento adscrito en Igualdad, junto a la etiqueta '#AsíNo'. "El Instituto de las Mujeres debe de ser para todas y cada una de las mujeres y esta mujer nos ha señalado a las mujeres trans, vejado e insultado: "Dictadura queer" / Lobby trans" / "Sigues lanzando odio igual que los queer" / "Puro delirio queer" / "La teoría queer tiene como objetivo perpetuar el patriarcado", ha lamentado. Envía tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)

author: Armando Yeferson
title: “No vamos a permitir que se vulnere la soberanía nacional”: Sheinbaum
text:
“Lo que no vamos a permitir nunca es que se vulnere la soberanía nacional y que se utilice a los mexicanos como parte de un proceso de campaña denigrando a México”, aseguró Claudia Sheinbaum en un encuentro con medios de comunicación junto a Adán Augusto.
Al ser cuestionado sobre la relación de Estados Unidos con México durante este año de elecciones, Sheinbaum aseguró que lo más importante es mantener una relación diplomática que priorice la igualdad entre las dos naciones.
Te podría interesar:
INE disfraza persecución política como fiscalización: Mario Delgado
“Nosotros queremos, y así se ha sostenido hasta ahora por primera vez, desde hace muchos años, una relación de iguales. Nosotros somos el primer socio comercial de Estados Unidos y es una relación de iguales”, agregó.
Desde Zacatecas, la morenista puntualizó que la decisión que tomen los estadounidenses en las próximas elecciones será respetada, ya que se trataría de la opinión del pueblo; sin embargo, hizo hincapié en que siempre se buscará que México tenga una relación amistosa tanto con Estados Unidos como con cualquier otro país.
Te podría interesar:
Defiende SCJN legalidad de voto de ministro sobre ley eléctrica
En tanto, en el encuentro también se abordaron temas como la unidad del movimiento de Transformación y la importancia de seguir trabajando hacia la construcción de la segunda etapa de la 4T.
LEO

author: ANI
title: India News | BSF Rescues 47 Cattle Heads Being Smuggled to Bangladesh Through Bordering Areas in Meghalaya | LatestLY
text: Shillong (Meghalaya) [India], December 30 (ANI): Thwarting yet another smuggling attempt, The Border Security Force rescued 47 cattle heads that were being smuggled to Bangladesh through the bordering areas of Meghalaya. "On December 30, 2023, vigilant troops of BSF Meghalaya successfully thwarted cattle smuggling attempts of miscreants by rescuing cattle heads (buffaloes) from the International border of Meghalaya. The cattle were being smuggled to Bangladesh through the bordering area of West Jaintia & East Khasi Hills districts of Meghalaya," the BSF said in a press release on Saturday. Also Read | IndiGo Passenger Discovers Live Worm in Sandwich on Delhi-Mumbai Flight, Woman Narrates Ordeal in Video. It further added that the seized cattle were handed over to the concerned police station for further necessary action. "Acting on specific information, the BSF party conducted a special operation near the International border. During this operation, the party managed to seize 47 cattle, which were concealed in a jungle area near the International border with the intention of smuggling into Bangladesh," it added. (ANI) Also Read | PM Narendra Modi Makes Surprise Visit to Dhaniram Manjhi, Beneficiary of House Under PM Awas Yojana, in Ayodhya (Watch Video). (This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)

author: iG Esporte
title: Grávida, jornalista da ESPN sofre assalto em frente ao CT do Palmeiras
text: Lilly Nascimento, jornalista da emissora "ESPN", foi assaltada em frente ao Centro de Treinamento do [Palmeiras ](https://esporte.ig.com.br/futebol/2024-04-25/liverpool-arsenal-monitoram-luis-guilherme-palmeiras-se-blinda-multa-astronomica.html) nesta quinta-feira (25). A repórter, que está grávida do seu segundo filho, estava fazendo uma matéria no local quando teve o seu celular roubado. Veja abaixo uma galeria de fotos de Lilly Nascimento: O roubo aconteceu na Avenida Marquês de São Vicente, rua que passa na frente do portão do CT e possui 'fama' de ser uma das mais perigosas da região. A "ESPN" confirmou o acontecido e informou que a jornalista está bem. Além do furto do aparelho, os bandidos acessaram as redes sociais de Lilly e estão usando o Instagram da jornalista, que possui mais de 200 mil seguidores, para tentar aplicar golpes financeiros nas pessoas que a seguem. As informações são do 'UOL'. Lilly, que é uma das repórteres mais utilizadas pela emissora, tinha acabado de retornar ao Brasil. A jornalista vinha da Argentina, onde fez a cobertura da partida do Corinthians contra o [Argentinos Jrs, pela Sul-Americana. ](https://esporte.ig.com.br/futebol/2024-04-23/sul-americana-corinthians-perde-para-argentino-jrs-deixa-lideranca.html) Veja mais novidades sobre o mundo da bola e todos os esportes no Brasil e no mundo [acompanhando nosso site.](https://esporte.ig.com.br/)
